title: What are we doing to our children? Part 2: welfare and the fatherless family
brief_description: Looks at the consequences of America’s Welfare system on young children. Daycare centers, unwed or working others, absentee fathers due to the welfare “man in the house” rule combine to inflict trauma on young children.
